bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8:40 AM. Morning recess is from 10:15 to 10:35 AM. Lunch is from 12:10 to 12:55 PM.  For Kindergarden to 3rd grader, and school ends at 2:45 PM. For 4th and 5th graders, school end at 3:15 PM.
